snippet: The Colts’ loss to the Jaguars ensured that they will have the first overall pick in the N.F.L. draft and that Stanford’s Andrew Luck will probably be theirs.
abstract: Jacksonville Jaguars defeat Indianapolis Colts, 19-13, final regular-season game, ensuring that the 2-14 Colts will have the first overall pick in the NFL draft.
lead_paragraph: The Colts’ loss to the Jaguars ensured that they will have the first overall pick in the N.F.L. draft and that Stanford’s Andrew Luck will probably be theirs.

headline.seo: Colts’ Loss Clears Path for Pursuing Andrew Luck
headline.main: Colts Gain From One Last Loss, Earning Top Pick
headline.print_headline: Colts Gain From One Last Loss, Earning Top Pick
